notes.note:
Fixed performance issue whereby some installations were initially slow to load pages ([Bug 1420641][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1420641

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox for Android 58.0.1 Release
